name: LocalizedMenu
author: zam1024t
description: Localize Tool & Localized Menu for Sublime Text 2/3/4 End User. Localization with 简体中文(Simplified Chinese)/繁体中文(Traditional Chinese)/Русский(Russian)/Español(Spanish)/Հայերեն(Armenian)/Svenska(Swedish)/Français(French)/Português(Portuguese)/Deutsch(German)/Magyar(Hungarian)/Any other language.
